definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲檢查在卵泡膜細胞瘤診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Normal range of the pituitary response during early follicular phase was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了早卵泡期婦女正常反應範圍。

sentences.english: Histological sections of fresh and cooled ovarian pieces were analyzed and the number of viable primordial follicles was counted.
sentences.chinese: 計數凍融後卵巢組織內形態正常始基卵泡數量。

sentences.english: The presence of high levels of FSH indicates lower numbers of eggs。
sentences.chinese: 高數值卵泡刺激素則意味着更少的卵子。

sentences.english: Conclusions Ovarian thecoma is a benign tumor with a favorable prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論卵巢卵泡膜細胞瘤屬良性腫瘤，預後良好。

sentences.english: This paper reports 5 cases of ovarian theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告5例卵巢卵泡膜細胞瘤。

sentences.english: That's a good sign that these follicles are healthy.
sentences.chinese: 這是個好的兆頭，說明這些卵泡是健康的。

sentences.english: Most ovarian follicles undergo an involutional process called follicular atresia.
sentences.chinese: 大多數卵泡都經過退化變爲閉鎖卵泡。

sentences.english: Most ovarian follicles undergo an involutional process called follicular atresia.
sentences.chinese: 大多數卵泡都經過退化變爲閉鎖卵泡。

sentences.english: The follicle produces the hormone estrogen and contains a maturing egg.
sentences.chinese: 卵泡產生雌激素且內含一個成熟中的卵子。

sentences.english: Because follicular period accident is changeful, oviposit happens likely at any time.
sentences.chinese: 因爲卵泡期的長短易變，排卵隨時有可能發生。

sentences.english: With the increases of follicle diameter, the diameter of nucleoli in oocytes reduced.
sentences.chinese: 隨着卵泡直徑增大，卵母細胞核仁直徑逐漸變小。

sentences.english: A serum-free culture system was used to study the in vitro culture of the preantral follicles from bovine ovaries.
sentences.chinese: 用無血清培養系統研究了牛腔前卵泡的體外培養。

sentences.english: All the oocytes are surrounded by zona pellucida and follicular cells.
sentences.chinese: 外周爲透明帶和卵泡細胞。

sentences.english: FSH was a crucial factor in formation of follicular antrum.
sentences.chinese: FSH在卵泡腔的形成中有決定性的作用。

sentences.english: We never knew how an individual follicle regulated these hormones.
sentences.chinese: 我們從來不知道一個卵泡是如何調節荷爾蒙的。

definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
